Desktop PCs at Currys PC World

Its really worth thinking about exactly what you want from your computer when shopping for a desktop PC. Its not necessary to spend lots of money on an ultra powerful, all singing and dancing machine if all you want to do is email your friends and do a spot of online shopping. At Currys PC World we have a huge choice of desktop computers, from the no-nonsense basic Tower PCs with all the essentials like Microsoft Office and internet, to the top-spec entertainment All-In-One PCs that provide stunning quality graphics, sound, speed and more - ideal for gaming and multimedia entertainment.

Ultrabook, Celeron, Celeron Inside, Core Inside, Intel, Intel Logo, Intel Atom, Intel Atom Inside, Intel Core, Intel Inside, Intel Inside Logo, Intel vPro, Itanium, Itanium Inside, Pentium, Pentium Inside, vPro Inside, Xeon, Xeon Phi and Xeon Inside are trademarks of Intel Corporation in the U.S. and/or other countries.

What desktop computers lack in portability, they more than make up for in the specs they possess. From desktop PCs designed for socialising with friends, to the most powerful processors that take your gaming to new levels our deals offer something for every sort of user. Whether youre looking for an all-in-one desktop computer, or the traditional tower-style PC, it pays to consider your purpose for purchasing. With brands such as HP, Acer, and Lenovo, our models satisfy many different demands across memory, storage type, number of cores, graphic types, screen resolutions and more.

Our huge selection of PCs also means we can cover a broad range of price points. If youre looking to conserve costs, for example, we have plenty of cheap desktop PCs for basic home computing, such as the HP desktop computers designed for social complete with Intel Celeron J4025 Processor, 4GB storage and Full HD display. At the more expensive end, carry out intensive work and bring creative ideas to life with Dell desktop computers and their Inspiron range. These 11th gen Intel Core processors have the power to handle even the most exhaustive of tasks. Or, go with our experts recommended pick: the HP Envy 31-a1001na 32 packs some extraordinary power.

Finally, serious gamers will know that fast, fluid graphics and speedy gameplay is a must. Immerse yourself well beyond the realms of console reality with our range of gaming desktop PCs, featuring bold, brilliant LED lights, unparalleled processors, graphics cards, and plenty of RAM storage. From the MSI Infinite, to the Lenovo Legion and ACER Nitro, all offer tons of storage, super-speedy loading times and the NVIDIA GeForce graphics card for the most engrossing exploration of other-worldly dimensions.
